entry.title: JavaScript DOM Manipulation Course
entry.summary: In website development, DOM stands for Document Object Model. It is a programming interface that allows us to create, change, or remove elements from a website document. DOM manipulation is when you use JavaScript to add, remove, and modify elements of a website. It is very common in web development.

entry.title: Precise Timing With Web Animations API
entry.summary: In JavaScript, itâ€™s natural to reach for timers when something is to happen on time.
